Gherkin:
Scenario: User receives an email with a one-time code for password reset
Given a user requests a password reset
When the request is processed
Then the user receives an email with a one-time code

Scenario: User does not receive an email if the email address is invalid
Given a user requests a password reset with an invalid email address
When the request is processed
Then the user does not receive an email with a one-time code

Scenario: One-time code expires after 10 minutes
Given a user receives a one-time code
When 10 minutes have passed
Then the one-time code is expired and cannot be used for password reset

Scenario: Password reset with a valid OTP
Given a user has a valid OTP
When the user attempts to reset the password
Then the system allows the password reset

Scenario: Password reset with an expired OTP
Given a user has an expired OTP
When the user attempts to reset the password
Then the system denies the password reset

Scenario: Password reset with an invalid OTP
Given a user has an invalid OTP
When the user attempts to reset the password
Then the system denies the password reset

Scenario: User can attempt password reset up to 3 times in one hour
Given a user attempts to reset the password
When the user has made fewer than 3 attempts in one hour
Then the system allows the password reset attempt

Scenario: User is blocked after 3 password reset attempts in one hour
Given a user has attempted to reset the password 3 times in one hour
When the user attempts a fourth reset
Then the system blocks the password reset attempt

Scenario: Attempt count resets after one hour
Given a user has made 3 password reset attempts in one hour
When one hour has passed
Then the system resets the attempt count

Scenario: Audit event is logged for successful password reset
Given a user successfully resets their password
When the password reset is completed
Then the system logs an audit event with user details and timestamp

Scenario: No audit event is logged for failed password reset
Given a user fails to reset their password
When the password reset attempt is denied
Then the system does not log an audit event

Scenario: Audit event is accessible in system logs
Given a password reset has been successfully completed
When an administrator checks the system logs
Then the audit event is present and accessible for verification
